participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, nurturing, and passionate about food and teaching.
participant_1.background: I work as a chef and love to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes. My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day. I enjoy writing poetry to express my emotions and cope with the challenges I've faced. I have only one child. I am in between classes.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Sociable, humorous, and family-oriented with a love for cooking.
participant_2.background: My favorite place to eat is at home, where I can enjoy my lasagna and not have to worry about the weather. My dog introduced me to my first and second wives. I'm almost finished with my degree. I was born in Baton Rouge. I am a doctor.

content.text: I'm doing well. I am between classes right now and I'm really enjoying the break.
That's nice. I'm almost finished with my degree. What are you studying?
I'm studying to be a chef. I love to cook and I'm excited to start my career.
That's great! I'm a doctor, but I love to cook too. My favorite dish is lasagna.
That's cool. I love lasagna too. I like to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes.
I've never tried kale in lasagna. Do you have a good recipe?
Yeah, I do. I'll send it to you later.
Great! Thanks. What's your favorite place to eat?
I love to eat at home, but I also like to go out to eat. I'm a big fan of Italian food.
Me too! I love Italian food. I'm from Baton Rouge, and there are a lot of great Italian restaurants there.
That's awesome! I've never been to Baton Rouge. I'd love to visit one day.
You should! It's a great city.
